text:
e="preserve">Irvin Lee Baxter Jr. (July 8, 1945 – November 3, 2020) was an American Oneness Pentecostal minister, televangelist, author, and biblical scholar. He hosted the biblical prophecy television program, "End of The Age", and, who also was the founder and president of Endtime Ministries.
He was a pastor of the Oak Park Church (UPCI). He was born in Richmond, Indiana.
Baxter Jr. died of COVID-19 on November 3, 2020 in Richardson, Texas, aged 75.
